attributes.additional_details: Over the last number of years the calls from call centres to my home Telephone have increased and have received up to 10 calls a day Ranging From 7 am on a Sunday Morning and up to 9.30 pm at Night  I am Petitioning that Phone and Mobile Phone Numbers are not sold on to anyone . And That Call Centres Only Contact People who Have Made Enquires About Products that the call Centres are Promoting.We all pay to have a phone in stalled in our homes for our own Convenience and not to be badgered throughout the Day and Evening by Cold Callers.Which also Effect Night Shift Workers who are woken by these Calls.
